QuestData.Title: Backup While I Pack Up
QuestData.Description: I came in here tae try an' reclaim as many relics as possible. Sneakin' in was easy, but I'm worried about things noticin' me while I pack up. $b$bMind watching me back while I get the relics stored in a safe place in my bag?
QuestData.RewardText: Everything worth our attention should be stored in my bag, many thanks.
